DescriptionData.Title: Tailors Sleeve Roll
DescriptionData.Description:
Slips easily into sleeves and narrow garment sections for perfect pressing of long or difficult to reach seams.
Excellent for pressing gathers and preventing seam edge imprint on cloth face

DescriptionData.Title: Tailors Pressing Ham
DescriptionData.Description:
The curved edges of the Tailor's Ham conform to the body shapes in garments, making it ideal for pressing sleeve-heads, curved seams and shaping collars.
It helps prevent seam turnings from showing when pressed.

DescriptionData.Title: Riley Blake - Good Natured - Rolie Polie
DescriptionData.Description:
Foxes, baby deer and birds, from the Riley Blake collection "Good Natured" by Marin Sutton. It is 100% cotton approximately 200gsm in weight. Perfect for quilting, dressmaking or crafts.
This charm pack contains 15 pre-cut 2.5 inch strips from the colleciton.

DescriptionData.Title: Riley Blake - Good Natured - 5' Stackers Charm Pack
DescriptionData.Description:
Foxes, baby deer and birds, from the Riley Blake collection "Good Natured" by Marin Sutton. It is 100% cotton approximately 200gsm in weight. Perfect for quilting, dressmaking or crafts.
This charm pack contains 15 pre-cut squares from the same collection.

DescriptionData.Title: Riley Blake - Good Natured - 10' Stackers Layer Cake
DescriptionData.Description:
Foxes, baby deer and birds, from the Riley Blake collection "Good Natured" by Marin Sutton. It is 100% cotton approximately 200gsm in weight. Perfect for quilting, dressmaking or crafts.
This charm pack contains 15 pre-cut squares from the same collection in 10" Squares..

DescriptionData.Title: Fiskars Classic Embroidery 10cm
DescriptionData.Description: Top quality embroidery scissors from Fiskars with high quality stainless steel blades for long lasting cutting performance. They have a very fine tip to help with cutting precision and intricacy.
